message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $11,000.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  While $9,500 is tempting, I'm still looking for a bit more to make this worthwhile for me. How about $10,500? It's a fair price that reflects the value of the product to you.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
